entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [AUDIT-20230425-20230724.csv.txt](https://github.com/dotnet/csharplang/files/12155668/AUDIT-20230425-20230724.csv.txt) #89410
  • [wasm][debugger] Debugger tests getting randomly aborted on CI #89409
    8.0.0
  • All Vector<T> operators use software fallbacks when AVX is not presented #89408
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] icu build related improvements #89406
    8.0.0
  • Blazor wasm aot is not ahead of time #89403
  • [wasm][AOT] emcc : error - received SIGKILL (-9) #89402
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.Tests` - assertion - `src/mono/mono/metadata/object.c:926` #89398
    8.0.0
  • [FileCheck] Only run disasm-checks on checked builds #89396
  • [Mono] Single stepping can cause runtime and debugger-libs to disagree on suspend count. #89391
    8.0.0
  • How to marshall null terminated array on .NET 7 using LibraryImport and ContiguousCollectionMarshaller #89389
  • [mono] The bitcast test fails with exit code 104 on apple mobile platforms #89385
    8.0.0
  • IsKnownConstant doesn't work well with Dynamic PGO #89379
    8.0.0
  • fgVNBasedIntrinsicExpansionForCall_ReadUtf8 supports only ASCII #89375
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR generates suboptimal codegen with structs passed via multiple registers #89374

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64Tests #85761
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.Double #85985
    8.0.0

    8.0.0

    8.0.0

    8.0.0

    8.0.0

    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Zero-overhead member access with suppressed visibility checks #81741
    8.0.0
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator Fails with ArgumentOutOfRangeException #86557
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix4x4 #80567
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_HashCode #80568
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime work planned for .NET 8 #79053
    8.0.0
  • System.Buffers work planned for .NET 8 #79006
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics work planned for .NET 8 #79005
    8.0.0
  • Tracking issue for enabling the Windows thread pool #85485
    8.0.0
  • Expose System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512F.VL #74813
    8.0.0
  • Expose VectorMask<T> to support generic masking for Vector<T> #74613
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8Formatter/Utf8Parser should have UInt128 and Int128 overloads #73842
    8.0.0
  • MSB3277 when using System.Reflection.Context in .NETStandard library consumed in .NETFramework #84320
    8.0.0
  • Assembly Version of System.DirectoryServices.Protocols 7.0.0 is 4.0.0.0 (and maybe a problem for finding the assembly during runtime?) #85296
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Ensure that debugger proxy, and the app are compatible #68402
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_26491/GitHub_26491_MultipleReturns/GitHub_26491_MultipleReturns.sh #61081
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Assertion failure in `DebuggerTests.HotReloadTests` on `main` - `src/mono/mono/component/debugger-engine.c:176` #88528
    8.0.0
  • `Directory.EnumerateFileSystemEntries` returns nonexistent paths on malformed input path #88504
  • [wasm][eat] System.Runtime.Loader test failing due to missing `System.MulticastDelegate` in `System.Runtime` #51893
    8.0.0
  • Reflection Loader search has changed since 4.6, and seems wrong now #81341
  • how to hotload dotnet assembly in coreclr? #85862
  • Regression in .NET 8.0-preview.5: dependent assembly is not included in TPA list when running fxdependent pwsh build with preview.5 dotnet.exe #86713
  • AssemblyLoadContext not unloading #79094
  • PluginLoadContext and Ef DBContext -memory leak - not unloading #77892
  • [browser][MT] Wasm.Browser.Threads.Minimal sample is failing #88057
    8.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects #86039
    8.0.0
  • X500DistinguishedName string representation and dotted-decimal attributes #89386
  • Test Failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693.dll #2 #85782
    8.0.0
  • Assembly.LoadFrom throws exception when loading System.Private.CoreLib.dll #89215
  • Cloud Native: Dynamic adaptation for bursty workloads in .NET GC #79658
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExportedTypes() throws StackOverflowException. #85159
  • Publish Docker containers using optimized composite R2R images #85358
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\unittests\\EHPatternTests\\EHPatternTests.cmd #84815
  • Ready To Run not working properly with DOTNET_EnableSSE=0 #85364
    Future
  • Test failure profiler\\elt\\slowpatheltenter\\slowpatheltenter.cmd #84750

  • [NativeAOT] Test failure in Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Tests #89286
    8.0.0
  • [7.0] coreclr Linux musl arm assert failure: `obj->GetGCSafeMethodTable()->HasFinalizer()` in syncblk.cpp #84719
  • .NET 7 console executable fails with 'Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000E' on Debian Linux (Seedbox) #79612
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetGeneration_fail/GetGeneration_fail.sh #80109
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.sh #79967
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\gettotalmemory\\gettotalmemory.cmd #79809
  • Do I need to limit GC Heap size when deploying to Kubernetes with windows containers? #83081
  • Test failure GC\\API\\Frozen\\Frozen\\Frozen.cmd #85863
  • [wasm] Random emcc/clang crashes on perf pipeline #76170
    7.0.x
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests.NativeBuild_WithDeployOnBuild_UsedByVS failing in CI due to SIGKILL #78893
    8.0.0
  • Hide ; BEGIN METHOD / ; END METHOD from JitDisasm #89357
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `emcc` crash on `dotnet-runtime-perf` pipeline #74724
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Streaming APIs for the `System.Net.Http.Json` extensions #87577
    8.0.0
  • System.Collections work planned for .NET 8 #77391
    8.0.0
  • Generate UUID-5 in FIPS-140-3 mode using SHA-1\MD-5 (RFC-4122) #87884
  • [NativeAOT] Assertions in InterproceduralScan while building libraries tests #89191
    8.0.0
  • Add mono binary to Nuget package to run AOT #38210
    8.0.0
  • Some .c and .h files are being published for non-blazorwasm apps #48016
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.CertificateCreation.CertificateRequestLoadTests.HashAlgorithmLaxInLoad #87387
  • [Android][Net6/7] TimeZoneInfo StandardName/DaylightName does not displays abbreviations anymore #85126
    8.0.0
  • RyuJIT generates poor code for a helper method which does `return Method(value, value)` #9916
    Future
  • [iOS] An SSL error when sending request to server using mac to deploy but successful when using windows and pair mac #87850
  • S.R.I.Wasm.PackedSimd API changes #88092
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Use JsonSerializable attribute in browser-bench sample #54227
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingWithHostAndTimeoutAndBufferAndPingOptions and others fail on AppleTV #73541
    8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Disable marshal-ilgen on iOS when not needed #88820
    8.0.0
  • Mono crashes test runs #73539
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests - Helix timeout #75830
    8.0.0
  • Convert MonoVM Samples into Functional Tests #43865
    8.0.0
  • Cannot make connection to Chromecast #83221
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] perf builds breaking with a linker NRE #76167
    8.0.0
  • Support AOT that target shared libraries on Mono for the .NET 7 time frame #68775
    8.0.0
  • Blazor wasm aot is not ahead of time #74864
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf`: `wasm-opt` failing with `unexpected expression typeemcc`, and killed with `SIGSEGV (-11)` #74088
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Tests.Perf_File.Delete has Regressed for the Mono Interpreter Ubuntu 18.04 and WASM #73861
    8.0.0
  • Mono does not align Int128 types on correct boundaries when p/invoking or passing pointers to them to unmanaged code #74223
    8.0.0
  • createdump is not being signed #89285
  • String.EndsWith("\0") behavior difference between .NET7 and .NET Framework #89378
  • [UnmanagedCallersOnly] is not supported on inner functions in Blazor #60800
    6.0.x
  • JsonElement.ArrayEnumerator breaks when using Lazy<> / Nullable<> wrapper #89384
  • [NativeAOT] consider using casting cache in GVMLookupForSlot scenario. #85927
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Stress\\ABI\\pinvokes_d\\pinvokes_d.cmd #66745
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Security.Cryptography.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89244
    8.0.0
  • `JsonIgnoreAttribute` isn't honored in init-only properties. #89365
  • logging JsonConsole default option #89306
    Future
  • [7.0] [tvOSSimulator] Ran out of trampolines of type 1 in System.Private.CoreLib #88746
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove InstructionSet_VectorT256 if AVX2 is disabled via env var #89413
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Gen0 Budget counter #89412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix `LocalBuilder.IsPinned` always returning `false` on CoreCLR runtime #89411
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Fixed python warning: DeprecationWarning: There is no current event loop #89404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Make PackedSimd.Shuffle internal #89401
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Bump timeout in runtime-extra-platforms-ioslike.yml #89400
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding test for #80049 #89399
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Adding test for #42421 #89395
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] fix NodeJS fetch detection #89393
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable System.Formats.Cbor test on apple mobile devices #89392
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #89388
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [browser] detect SIMD and EH support #89387
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Support non-ascii in fgVNBasedIntrinsicExpansionForCall_ReadUtf8 #89383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix System.BinaryData tests failing in AOT. #89381
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Make textual stack trace metadata smaller #89377
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [JIT] Do not show a pop-up dialog when an assertion occurs in SuperPMI collection #89336
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix config src-gen issues with binding nullable values #89397
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Release all proxies of C# and JS objects on WebWorker #88052
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Tweak and fix physical promotion test environments #89380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable HttpClientFactory mock test on AOT #89390
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • DependencyGraphViewer: Feature add same window navigation for NodeForm #84542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added 'DOTNET_JitDisasmTesting' knob. #89373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement new streaming APIs for the `System.Net.Http.Json` extensions #89258
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make checks for compiler-generated types more specific #89327
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use JIT intrinsic for UTF8 encoding in Utf8.TryWrite's AppendLiteral #89376
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [mono][ios] Drop marshal-ilgen from iOS builds if it is not needed #88903
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2228329 #89321
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Replace GVMLookupForSlot internal cache with generic cache similar to CastCache #89331
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump word-wrap from 1.2.3 to 1.2.4 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #89198
    area-DependencyModel, javascript
  • Avoid BYREF trees in ByteOffset #89324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Enabled more intrinsics for V4 on arm64 #88912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Don't always do optimistic HW intrinsic expansion #89282
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono] [RISCV] Fix abi issues (Monthly pr) #88649
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • [Mono] UnsafeAccessor: Support ambiguous method match #89217
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix TraceSwitch to synchronize the Value and Level properties #89278
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 8.0.0
  • Allow reference types for pinned GC.AllocateArray() #89293
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

    area-CodeGen-coreclr

    area-CodeGen-coreclr

    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Is this all I need to do? #89316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create docs transport package and turn on extensions source of truth #89312
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unbox a true nullable without Opcodes.Unbox #89108
    area-System.Reflection

    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0

  • Add package readme for obsolete .NET Standard 1.x packages #88911

  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • handle QUIC_STATUS_ADDRESS_NOT_AVAILABLE #89362
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` calendar data #89255

    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #89296
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • [IGNORE] Investigate returning ConnectionError instead NameResolution #89260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Check for dotnet.dll when enumerating SDK paths #89333
    area-Host
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Update Workflow instruction for codespace #89368
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
